resp = client.reindex(
    source={
        "index": "my-index-000001",
        "slice": {
            "id": 0,
            "max": 2
        }
    },
    dest={
        "index": "my-new-index-000001"
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.reindex(
    source={
        "index": "my-index-000001",
        "slice": {
            "id": 1,
            "max": 2
        }
    },
    dest={
        "index": "my-new-index-000001"
    },
)
print(resp1)
